content.query:
Create database serverlesspooldb

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://demostorageacctgm.dfs.core.windows.net/files/ecdc_cases.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

create external data source covid
with ( location = 'https://demostorageacctgm.dfs.core.windows.net/files')

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'ecdc_cases.csv',
        data_source = 'covid',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2
      --  HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) with (
        reportdate varchar(10) 1, 
        covidcases int 5,
        location varchar(6) 8
    ) as rows
